field.name: TypeID
field.sql: select * from vp_rang_types where Level>0 order by Level

buy2.sql: set @Price1=(select Price - coalesce((select round(max(p.Price)*floor((`end` - unix_timestamp( )) /(60*60*24*31))/max(p.Term),1) from vp_rang_prices p, vp_rangs r where p.Term <= r.Term and r.UserID = '$auth->user;' and r.TypeID = p.TypeID AND `end` > unix_timestamp( )),0) from vp_rang_prices where TypeID=@TypeID; and Term=@Term;) #set @Price2=(select round(@Price1*$dollar;)) #set @error=if((select r.TypeID from vp_rangs r where `end`>unix_timestamp() and r.UserID=$auth->user;) > $TypeID;,'Ранг ниже текущего',0) #insert into vp_bills( Type, Currency, UserID, Money, Date, TypeID,Term) values( '1', '0', $auth->user;, @Price1,@Date;,@TypeID,@Term)

field.name: TeamName
field.sql: select ShortName from ut_teams where TeamID=$auth->team;

field.name: sum
field.sql: select round((Price - coalesce((select round(max(p.Price)*floor((`end` - unix_timestamp( )) /(60*60*24*31))/max(p.Term),1) from vp_rang_prices p, vp_rangs r where p.Term <= r.Term and r.UserID = '$auth->user;' and r.TypeID = p.TypeID AND `end` > unix_timestamp( )),0))*$dollar;) from vp_rang_prices where TypeID=@TypeID; and Term=@Term;

field.sql: select Price - coalesce((select round(max(p.Price)*floor((`end` - unix_timestamp( )) /(60*60*24*31))/max(p.Term),1) from vp_rang_prices p, vp_rangs r where p.Term <= r.Term and r.UserID = '$auth->user;' and r.TypeID = p.TypeID AND `end` > unix_timestamp( )),0) from vp_rang_prices where TypeID=@TypeID; and Term=@Term;

field.name: Rang
field.sql: select Name_$lang; from vp_rang_types where TypeID=@TypeID;

view.sql: select b.*,t.Name_$lang; as Rang,t.id as TeamID, concat(b.Money,(case b.Currency when 0 then 'd' when 1 then 'р' end)) as Money,(case b.Type when 0 then 'банк' when 1 then 'wm' when 2 then 'card' end) as Type,u.login as User,t.name as Team from vp_bills b join `nekki-butsa`.users u on b.UserID=u.id join `nekki-butsa`.teams t on t.manager=b.UserID left outer join `nekki-test`.vp_rang_types t on t.TypeID=b.TypeID order by Date desc

view2.sql: select b.*,t.Name_$lang; as Rang,t.id as TeamID, concat(b.Money,(case b.Currency when 0 then 'd' when 1 then 'р' end)) as Money,(case b.Type when 0 then 'банк' when 1 then 'wm' when 2 then 'card' end) as Type,concat(b.lastname,' ',b.firstname,' ',b.surname) as User,t.name as Team from vp_bills b join `nekki-butsa`.users u on b.UserID=u.id join `nekki-butsa`.teams t on t.manager=b.UserID left outer join `nekki-test`.vp_rang_types t on t.TypeID=b.TypeID where b.Type=0 order by Date desc

view3.sql: select t.id,t.name,b.BillID,concat(b.LastName,' ',b.FirstName,' ',b.SurName,' ','(',u.Login,')') as User,b.Money,b.FirstName,b.LastName,b.SurName,b.City,b.Date,r.TypeID,r.Term, u.Login from `vp_bills` b join vp_rangs r left outer join ut_users u on r.UserID=u.UserID on b.UserID=r.UserID left outer join `nekki-butsa`.teams t on t.manager=u.UserID where b.Type=0 order by Date desc
